amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 116-392 to increase funding to conduct a study on the impacts on educational attainment, long-term economic opportunities and well-being of students from Puerto Rico who have had to disrupt or change their educational path due to a natural disaster.
amendment.purpose: Amendment increases funding to conduct a study on the impacts on educational attainment, long-term economic opportunities and well-being of students from Puerto Rico who have had to disrupt or change their educational path due to a natural disaster.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 149 (Roll no. 52).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Shalala.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 149 (Roll no. 52).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
